Hospital.Patient

Class DiagnosisCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • Hospital.Patient.DiagnosisCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Command

    public class DiagnosisCommand
extends java.lang.Object
implements Command
    Creates a diagnosis (with or without second opinion), and undoes that later if necessary

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DiagnosisCommand(Doctor doctor, Diagnosis diagnosis)
      Create a DiagnosisCommand that doesn't need a second opinion
      DiagnosisCommand(Doctor doctor, Diagnosis diagnosis, Doctor approvalOf)
      Constructor: Create a diagnosisCommand with a possible second opinion

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String execute()
      Adds the diagnosis to the patient Adds the diagnosis to the list of second opinions of the doctor that needs to approve the diagnosis
      boolean isDone()
      Returns whether the command was done.
      java.lang.String toString() 
      java.lang.String undo()
      Removes the diagnosis from the patient This cannot be done when a treatment was added.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • DiagnosisCommand

        public DiagnosisCommand(Doctor doctor,
                Diagnosis diagnosis,
                Doctor approvalOf)
                 throws NoOpenedPatientFileException,
                        PatientIsDischargedException,
                        InvalidArgumentException
        Constructor: Create a diagnosisCommand with a possible second opinion
        Parameters:
        doctor - the doctor making the diagnosis
        diagnosis - the diagnosis that must be added to the patient
        approvalOf - the doctor that must approve the diagnosis, null if no approval is needed
        Throws:
        NoOpenedPatientFileException - the creating doctor has no patient file opened
        PatientIsDischargedException - the patient this diagnosis applies to is not checked in
        InvalidArgumentException - if the given doctor was null

      • DiagnosisCommand

        public DiagnosisCommand(Doctor doctor,
                Diagnosis diagnosis)
                 throws NoOpenedPatientFileException,
                        PatientIsDischargedException,
                        InvalidArgumentException
        Create a DiagnosisCommand that doesn't need a second opinion
        Parameters:
        doctor - The doctor that makes the diagnosis
        diagnosis - The diagnosis that must be introduced
        Throws:
        NoOpenedPatientFileException - if no patient was opened
        PatientIsDischargedException - if the patient that gets the diagnosis is already discharged
        InvalidArgumentException - if the given doctor was null
